html:
1.2.21  6:59 pm   What is the difference between, for example, a D/C chord, vs a C^13#11 chord? Is it purely a difference of which notation is cleaner, or does it reflect emphasis on different notes, a different harmonic context, etc.

      if it says C13, that probably means it's supposed to include Bb note. where as D/C does not. also C13#11 does not necessarily have to include D, where as D/C probably does

1.2.21  6:40 pm   do you have fun making music?

      yes

1.2.21  6:34 pm   What's the background for creating the "might quit" song?

      that was originally a dream melody. the melody was in a dream. so i woke up and added it to the songwriting catalog, as seen here. Then one day, when choosing my next song, that piece won the song selection. it had no lyrics when it was selected, and was also only the verse. so then i had to write the rest, then record the song, then do the video, all of which were done pretty much according to standard writing/production procedures

1.2.21  6:00 pm   is there a deeper meaning to every song you write?

     it depends how deep the first meaning you've found is

     because on Genius, people are writing 'deeper meanings' to the lyrics of your songs

     deeper is a comparative word. ('taller', 'shorter', etc) there kind of has to be another thing first, for something to be something-er than

1.2.21  5:40 pm   do you plan on putting your two new songs into your songs list on this website?

     yes

     (since they don't come with videos)

     no that's not correct, they will come with videos. they will be listed on the songs page without the video, beacuse the songs page is an audio only page. they will be posted on the videos page as music videos. And also released to my youtube channel, as videos. and posted to music services (spotify, apple, etc) as audio only

     i'm really excited to see what you've made!

1.2.21  3:41 pm   when did you start writing the current song?

      august something, 2010

1.2.21  3:35 pm   what do you think is the best quality that you have that makes you, you as a person

      the ability to chronically overestimate myself

1.2.21  10:35 am   I can play music off of the way it sounds but I can't exactly read sheet music as well, any tips?

      use the 5 finger technique. For the next month, count on your fingers how many times you are in a situation where you need to read sheet music

1.2.21  10:25 am   will we ever see another episode of Wild Frolicking Adventures of Informational Education?

      i don't see why not

1.2.21  5:28 am   are rectangles technically squares?

      only if their length and width are the same

1.2.21  1:49 am   What do you think about Artist Technicians?

     pretty good. i will hire some

     Is that a method you would ever consider employing?

     yes

     Is art the idea or the execution?

     art can be anything

     Is the execution the end result or is it the work that went in?

     execution is when you do a thing which therefore produces results

1.2.21  12:52 am   I need to spice up the drums in my songs, but I don't know anything about percussion. Help? 

      the only way you can learn that is by doing it, and listening to when other people have done it in a way that you like, then doing it more, etc

1.2.21  12:19 am   I'd like to know a topic that will show up in your next song, if you'd care to share

      sadness

1.1.21  11:30 pm   how do you avoid focusing on the wrong things? or how to even properly prioritize what to f ocus on and for how long

      that's easy, just focus on everything at all times

1.1.21  10:07 pm   how fast are you working?

      as fast as i can

1.1.21  8:05 pm   What should I do a digital painting of? 

      how about a....... tiny square

1.1.21  7:32 pm   What is your new years resolution

      i don't make resolutions for new years. i just make them whenever i need them

1.1.21  7:13 pm   Do your songs have any real meaning?

      yes

1.1.21  6:51 pm   Why does it seem like you have ascended to a higher level of understanding?

      could be some of the phrases i use

1.1.21  6:50 pm   What do you think is your greatest accomplishment? 

      we'll see

1.1.21  6:24 pm   What is your MBTI type?

      Mild, Bold, Tries things, Isn't a villain

1.1.21  5:28 pm   I'm already a percussionist, but I'd like to learn another instrument. Any suggestions? Also, Happy New Year!

     how about the piano keyboard

1.1.21  4:57 pm   how do I achieve something?

      start by writing it down

1.1.21  3:15 pm   i want to find my own sound in music but every song i make sounds very inconsistent to each other. should i limit myself to using same instruments and sounds in my music or do you have any other idea that can help? btw thanks for being you and making awesome songs and videos, you really inspire me

      what i do is, i try as hard as i can to make every song sound different. but, because it's still me, it always sounds similar

1.1.21  3:03 pm   Is Bohemian Rhapsody one song or many songs strung together?

      let me check... i think it's 1

1.1.21  2:38 pm   why is 'in california' such a great song?

      could be the family values/morals

1.1.21  1:27 pm   how the hell do you make such groovey and intrecate precussion?

     sometimes i have to step over to the dark side

     it feels sort of random when you listen to it, but man does it mesh together with the whole aethstetic

     holy smokes you are very friendly

1.1.21  12:35 pm   What's your new year's resolution

      to do a great job on questions today

1.1.21  12:13 pm   How is your new year?

      too new. don't know yet

1.1.21  12:07 pm   when is you're next video

      doing it now

1.1.21  11:13 am   If and when covid is set and done, and other things permitting, are you still interested in a live bwb concert series?

      yes

1.1.21  11:07 am   have you ever been on an adventure ?

      yes..... i'm on one now

1.1.21  10:19 am   how to do new year?

      1 day at a time

1.1.21  9:51 am   have you ever thought about writing a book?

      no but i will continue doing a lot of writing outside of books, which in my opinion is a much more fruitful place for my writing

1.1.21  9:16 am   What is inside of a box that is inside of fragile box? 

      maybe some mush

1.1.21  7:01 am   How do I not get bored while staying in home?

      see if you can change the world. unless you already like how it is, in which case maybe do some pop quizzes about how the world is

1.1.21  6:27 am   will this be the first question answered in 2021?

      no

1.1.21  5:52 am   How do I become motivated?

      i'm wondering what motivated you to ask this

1.1.21  5:44 am   does the length of time since you've last uploaded become daunting when working upon your current video?

     yes

     i.e thinking that you have to make it more grand than the previous one, overestimating your own abilities, having to chalk it back down, repeat?

     that's what i always have to do anyway. that's just who i am

1.1.21  5:18 am   how do you deal with the struggle between quantity and quality?

      that's not a struggle. those 2 things are not at war. they are friendly companions to each other

1.1.21  4:41 am   Its past 3 am amd I just had a meal of greek yogurt and pickles. (not together) does this make me mentally unstable?

      no

1.1.21  3:49 am   is 2020 a bad yaer

      it was bad in many ways but it was also good in some ways

1.1.21  2:45 am   hows 2021?

      i mostly don't know yet

1.1.21  2:01 am   Are you a time traveller?

      yes, it's impossible to travel without time

1.1.21  1:54 am   Are birds government spys?

      spys are govvernment birds

1.1.21  1:45 am   How to smart?

      don't even joke about that

1.1.21  1:22 am   I have a song in my head but I'm not sure how to write it down, how do I capture it before it flies away?

      make a phone recording of you singing it and explaining everything you know about it

1.1.21  12:52 am   It's 2021. Do you have the song conplete? I understand that the video might not be complete, as I know what you said 3 years ago, but is the song complete?

      i have 2 new songs complete and i am working on a video for one of them, then i will release that and then probably do a video for the other one. and then make many more





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

12.31.20  11:51 pm   How can a person stop being unhappy and prevent regretting everything ?? 

      do something totally new

12.31.20  11:42 pm   what's your theme for this year?

      facing the final boss.... which has been me
